amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new title creating a national renewable electricity and energy efficiency standard which would result in 25 percent of all energy in the United States being generated from renewables by the year 2035.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 112-680 to create a national renewable electricity and energy efficiency standard.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 250 (Roll no. 598).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Markey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 250 (Roll no. 598).
